options.responseText: Whoa, you okay there? Covering your eyes like you just saw a deathclaw!

followUpOptions.optionText: I didn’t see anything! I swear!
followUpOptions.responseText: Didn’t see anything, huh? You’re awfully jumpy for someone who 'didn’t see anything'. But hey, no harm done.

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m blind! I’m totally blind! Didn’t see a thing!
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, totally blind? Well, good news for you—I’m not offended. But you might wanna work on those stealth skills!

options.responseText: What are you looking at back there?

responseTexts: What, did the vault install a spanking machine and forget to tell me? ♥
Well, that better be Vault-Tec approved because I’d hate to think you just activated the 'butt-slap alarm.' Next one’s gonna cost ya! ♥
Ohhh... Someone’s skipping the foreplay and diving right into the action. You better be ready to finish this job. ♥︎
Oh, didn’t think you’d go for it... but fuck, don’t stop now! My pussy’s got more mileage left than you can handle! ♥︎
Mmm, ohhh... you got some fucking nerve. But I like it. You better work those fingers like your life depends on it. ♥︎
*Panting* Oh fuck, you’re really going in, huh? Don’t stop ‘til my fucking legs give out. ♥︎
